summary: so I\'m going to need people to try this out and leave comments on the bugs. I\'ve tested it with all races except argonian and khajit. Male and Female if it doesn\'t work on those characters please leave a comment. you can msg bugs to my email: ericnrmrf@gmail.com
descriptionHtml:
Item is located at the entrance to whiterun on top the guard tower on the left

Celebrate the 4th of July with red white and blue executioner mask because god loves Amurica!!!!

In order to get this mod working follow these steps

1. make sure you have meshes and textures folder in skyrim/data

2. unpack the file

3. place netimmersive/gambryo (NIF) files with \"001\" prefix in meshes

4. add \"001executionerhood.dds\" to textures.

5. add \"4th of July.esp\" to skyrim data

6.load and enjoy

I\'m not sure if this works with NMM
author: ericnrmrf
